1.19.2.1.1.5a: fix incompatibility with some mods that change respawning

1.19.2.1.2.0: add datapack support, player arguments for commands, piglin infection
1.19.2.1.2.1: fix various bugs, add fallback horde table and better error logging
1.19.2.1.2.1a: fixed errors in default table, zombie horse speed, config crashes and incorrect text
1.19.2.1.2.3: backport 1.20 checks to prevent horde spawning in water
1.19.2.1.5.4: a lot of bug fixes, new translations
